ui.app.httpsDescription: Bez HTTPS jūsu konfidenciālie dati tiks pārsūtīti nešifrēti.
ui.app.configSecurity1: DROŠĪBAS BRĪDINĀJUMS !!! Konstatēts neaizsargāts konfigurācijas direktorijs
ui.app.configSecurity2:
The Contao Manager has detected that its config files are publicly accessible. All operations are disabled until the directory is secured, otherwise an attacker could access sensitive data of your installation.

To fix this issue, make sure to prevent access to the "contao-manager" directory on your server. To learn how to do this, please refer to the manual of your webserver or contact your hosting provider.
ui.account.intro:
Welcome to the Contao Manager, a universal tool to install and manage Contao 4 Open Source CMS. If you are new to it, please read the manual to get started.

If you encouter any problems, check our GitHub issues and feel free to create new one for anything that has not been reported yet.
ui.account.headline: Lietotāja konts
ui.account.description: Lai pārvaldītu savu instalāciju, lūdzu, izveidojiet Contao pārvaldnieka kontu. Ņemiet vērā, ka šis konts nav saistīts ar Contao aizmuguri vai priekšu.
ui.account.contribute:
Contao and the Contao Manager are sponsored by the non-profit Contao Association.
Please consider contributing to open source by becoming a member.
ui.login.headline: Pierakstīties
ui.logout.headline: Session Timeout
ui.logout.warning: Your have been inactive for more than 25 minutes. For security reasons your session will be terminated shortly.
ui.logout.expired: Your session was automatically terminated because you have been inactive for more than 30 minutes.
ui.oauth.error: Nederīgs OAuth mēģinājums. Pārbaudiet pieprasījuma parametrus.
ui.oauth.headline: OAuth autentifikācija
ui.oauth.description: Šāda lietojumprogramma vai pakalpojums pieprasa attālo piekļuvi jūsu Contao Manager instancei.
ui.boot.headline: Sistēmas pārbaude
ui.boot.description: Lūdzu, uzgaidiet, mēs analizējam jūsu serveri ...
ui.boot.issue2: Jūsu instalācijai ir problēmas, kuras jānovērš, pirms var izmantot Contao Manager.
ui.recovery.headline: Sistēmas atkopšana
ui.recovery.description: The Contao Manager detected files that look like Contao, but the Command Line Interface does not work as expected. Please choose an option to repair your installation.
ui.recovery.repairDescription: Attempts to automatically repair the installation by rebuilding the application cache and re-installing the Composer packages.
ui.recovery.repairWarning: Any modifications to the vendor files might be deleted in the process!
ui.recovery.repairFailed: Automatic repair was not successful. Try the Safe Mode to manually repair the installation.
ui.recovery.safeModeDescription: Launching the Contao Manager in Safe Mode allows to manage packages and run certain maintenance tasks, but features that rely on a working Contao installation will not be available.
ui.server.error: Pārbaude neizdevās servera negaidītas atbildes dēļ.
ui.server.prerequisite: Check cancelled due to a missing prerequisite.
ui.server.selfUpdate.title: Contao pārvaldnieka atjauninājumi
ui.server.selfUpdate.update: Ir pieejama jauna Contao pārvaldnieka versija {latest}.
ui.server.selfUpdate.dev: Development builds do not support automatic updates.
ui.server.selfUpdate.unsupported: Ir pieejama jauna versija, taču tā neatbalsta jūsu PHP versiju.
ui.server.config.title: Servera konfigurācija
ui.server.config.description:
To correctly run background tasks, the Contao Manager needs to know where to find the PHP command line binary and how to run commands separated from the web process.

Most servers will be detected automatically. If your hosting provider is not listed, feel free to add the necessary details to our wiki.
ui.server.config.formText: Select the configuration that matches your server or hosting provider. For a custom configuration, select "Other …".
ui.server.config.customText: Please enter the path to your PHP binary. Make sure the binary is the same PHP version as your web process.
ui.server.config.cloudText: The Composer Resolver Cloud allows to install Composer dependencies even if your server does not provide enough local memory. Please be aware that your package information will be transmitted to a cloud server operated by the Contao Association.
ui.server.config.phpDetected: Jūsu serveris nav zināms, taču automātiski tika atrasts derīgs PHP ceļš.
ui.server.config.stateError: Jūsu hostinga pakalpojumu sniedzējs nav konfigurēts.
ui.server.config.stateErrorCli: Serverī netika atrasts derīgs PHP binārs.
ui.server.config.stateErrorCloud: The Composer Resolver Cloud is not supported.
ui.server.php_web.title: PHP Web process
ui.server.php_web.below7: Atrasta PHP versija {versija}. Lūdzu, pēc iespējas ātrāk pārejiet uz PHP 7!
ui.server.php_web.success: Atrasta PHP versija {versija}, neviena zināma problēma nav atrasta.
ui.server.php_cli.title: PHP komandrindas saskarne
ui.server.php_cli.success: Atrasta PHP versija {versija}, neviena zināma problēma nav atrasta.
ui.server.composer.title: Composer vide
ui.server.contao.title: Contao instalācija
ui.server.contao.old: Contao versija {versija} nav savietojama ar Contao pārvaldnieku, lūdzu, manuāli atjauniniet instalāciju.
ui.server.contao.headline: Contao uzstādīšana
ui.server.contao.description: Laipni lūdzam jūsu Contao Open Source CMS iestatīšanas procesā. Varat izvēlēties starp divām instalācijas versijām.
ui.server.contao.ltsText: LTS versijai ir pagarināts atbalsta periods līdz pat četriem gadiem.
ui.server.contao.latestText: Jauna jaunākā versija tiek izlaista ik pēc sešiem mēnešiem februārī un augustā.
ui.server.contao.releaseplan: See the Contao Release Plan for detailed information.
ui.taskpopup.failedHeadline: Contao Manager neizdevās sākt konsole uzdevumu!
ui.taskpopup.failedDescription:
Something went wrong while trying to execute the task in the background.
If this happens again, your server might not be supported.
ui.taskpopup.autoclose: Aizvērt uzdevumu, ja tas ir veiksmīgs
ui.taskpopup.confirmCancel: Are you sure to cancel this task? This might leave your Contao installation in an broken state!
ui.maintenance.rebuildCache.title: Lietojumprogrammas kešatmiņa
ui.maintenance.rebuildCache.description: Rebuilding the application cache is required after modifying any of the configuration files.
ui.maintenance.installTool.title: Contao instalēšanas rīks
ui.maintenance.installTool.description: The Contao Install Tool is automatically locked if you enter a wrong password three times in a row.
ui.maintenance.dumpAutoload.title: Composer Class Loader
ui.maintenance.dumpAutoload.description: The Composer autoloader is responsible for PHP class loading. The autoloader must be dumped after adding custom namespaces to the root composer.json.
ui.maintenance.composerInstall.title: Composer Dependencies
ui.maintenance.composerInstall.descripti: Composer dependencies are located in the /vendor folder in your application root. Reinstalling the dependencies can be necessary after manipulation or manually uploading the composer.lock file.
ui.maintenance.composerCache.title: Composer kešatmiņa
ui.maintenance.composerCache.description: Composer caches downloaded packages for improved performance. If you have issues like broken files, try to delete the Composer cache to force a new download.
ui.maintenance.debugMode.title: Atkļūdošanas režīms
ui.maintenance.debugMode.description: Activate the debug mode by setting a user and password for the app_dev.php entry point.
ui.maintenance.opcodeCache.title: Opcode Cache
ui.maintenance.opcodeCache.description: Opcode caches PHP files on the web process for faster execution. It must be deleted under certain circumstances if files are not recognized after changing.
ui.maintenance.unsupported: Not supported by your Contao version
ui.packages.uploadMessage: You have {total} unconfirmed upload. ::: You have {total} unconfirmed uploads.
ui.packages.uploadIncomplete: This file was not uploaded completely. Please remove it and try again.
ui.packages.uploadDuplicate: This file seems to be uploaded multiple times. Please remove the duplicates.
ui.packages.uploadInstalled: This file is already installed. Please remove the duplicates.
ui.packages.uploadUnsupported: Uploads are not supported in your installation. Please make sure to update your dependencies.
ui.packages.changesMessage: Jums ir {total} neapstiprināta izmaiņa. ::: Jums ir {total} neapstiprinātas izmaiņas.
ui.package.hintConstraint: This package will be installed with constraint {constraint} when you apply the changes.
ui.package.hintConstraintBest: This package will be installed in the best available version when you apply the changes.
ui.package.hintConstraintChange: The constraint for this package will be changed from "{from}" to "{to}" when you apply the changes.
ui.package.hintConstraintUpdate: This package will be updated when you apply the changes.
ui.package.hintRemoved: Šī pakotne tiks noņemta, kad piemērosiet izmaiņas.
ui.package.requiredText: This package is required in your composer.json but not installed.
ui.package.incompatibleText: This package is not supported in Contao 4 Managed Edition.
ui.package.abandonedText: Šī pakotne ir atzīmēta kā pamesta.
ui.package.uploadedText: Upload a new file to update.
ui.package.proprietaryText: Lai iegūtu vairāk informācijas, lūdzu, apmeklējiet vietni.
ui.package.replacement: Šī pakotne ir atzīmēta kā pamesta, lūdzu, izmantojiet "{replacement}" .
ui.package.uploadConstraint: This constraint is defined by the uploaded package.
ui.packagesearch.offlineExplain: Pārbaudiet savu interneta savienojumu un atspējojiet JavaScript bloķētājus savā pārlūkprogrammā.
